string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: It is the shape of a ball or the sun
It is an elongated cirle as an egg
It is the figure of four equal sides
It has two long sides and two short

string-array.name: event_draw
string-array.item: Touch the screen to draw some circles
Touch the screen to draw some ovals
Touch the screen to draw some squares
Touch the screen to draw some rects
Slide your finger across the screen to draw some shapes
